sections.heading: Hearings6-138.HearingsThe deputy director or an administrative law judge shall conduct hearings, including hearings relating to orders of the deputy director granting, denying, revoking or suspending a permit, certificate or license provided for under this title, in accordance with title 41, chapter
sections.text: Hearings6-138.HearingsThe deputy director or an administrative law judge shall conduct hearings, including hearings relating to orders of the deputy director granting, denying, revoking or suspending a permit, certificate or license provided for under this title, in accordance with title 41, chapter 6, article 10.
